reviews.title: For parents only, not for children
reviews.comment: It is meant to be for children. I\'d not advise this for children.  Parents, here what it does:  - Your are interrupted all the way when your children wants to draw - It\'s really not just one message that pops up, a lot of them - It pops up \"app of the week\" message that is not optin and forces you to open Google Play, even if you don\'t want to -  Every time with a pop up app and showing teasers at the end, children gets distracted and after a while.  Seems to me a very greedy app.
reviews.author: Asif Anwar

reviews.title: Greedy
reviews.comment: This app useless and very greedy.
